1.title: Uzumaki Boruto!!
1.plot: Prior to entering the Ninja Academy, Boruto Uzumaki, the son of Naruto Uzumaki, meets a bullied boy named Denki Kaminarimon, who is being forced to join the academy for the sake of his father's company.

2.title: Hokage no musuko...!!
2.plot: After having been suspended for two weeks for the trouble he caused at the entrance ceremony, Boruto finally begins his days attending the academy.

3.title: Bôsô, Metaru Rî!!
3.plot: Metal Lee is a hard working boy who is talented at taijutsu, but he easily comes under pressure and gets very nervous when others are watching him, which cause him to make mistakes. After Shikadai harshly comments on this, Metal Lee becomes enraged and a fight ensues. Boruto, however, notices that the same phenomenon that happened with Denki is now happening to Metal.

4.title: Danjo taikô ninjutsu kassen!!
4.plot: Tensions begin to rise between the boys and girls in class. During a lunch break, when Boruto and Sarada start antagonizing one another, Shino intervenes and suggests that things be settled with a capture the flag mission.

5.title: Nazo no tenkôsei...!!
5.plot: Boruto and his classmates welcome a new student Mitsuki from the hidden sound village.

6.title: Saigo no jugyô...!!
6.plot: The battle between Shino sensei and the trio.

7.title: Koi to potechi...!!
7.plot: Chocho believes that she has a stalker following her. When the culprit is revealed, it turns out to be to be a schoolmate who actually has his eyes set on somebody else.

8.title: Yume no otsuge
8.plot: Boruto has a dream one night of a mysterious man telling him that his special eye power will be the key to fending off great destruction. After this dream, Boruto is convinced he has awakened the Byakugan. However, Naruto and Hinata are not so sure.

9.title: Jibun no shômei
9.plot: Boruto takes on his aunt Hanabi in a fighting match to prove he has awakened the Byakugan. After the match, Hanabi unfortunately declares that there is no sign of the Byakugan being active in him.

10.title: Gôsuto jiken, sôsa kaishi!!
10.plot: Boruto's class is having a lesson about workplace experience and are able to learn about any job in the village. Boruto, Mitsuki, and Shikadai choose postal service as an excuse to search the village for the "ghost" that has been possessing people.

11.title: Kuromaku no kage
11.plot: Naruto warns Boruto to stop investigating the dilemma involving the "ghost" as the situation is starting to grow more dangerous. However, Boruto refuses to stand idly by as this threat continues to bring harm to his friends.

12.title: Boruto to Mitsuki
12.plot: A glimpse of Mitsuki past is shown. The Academy students take a training course with a three-man team. Mitsuki visits Sumire in the hospital she's staying at.

13.title: Majû, genru...!!
13.plot: Mitsuki reveals to Boruto the culprit behind the ghost attacks. When a giant monster, the Nue, suddenly appears, Mitsuki tells Boruto that the culprit needs to eliminated. Boruto insists on stopping him, now knowing the culprit is a friend.

14.title: Boruto ni mieru michi
14.plot: After being sucked into Nue's dimension, Boruto and Mitsuki fight off the monster and try to stop Sumire.

15.title: Atarashî michi
15.plot: With the ghost dilemma resolved, everything in the village seems to go back to normal. But Boruto and his class wonder what has become of Sumire since she has yet to return to the academy.

16.title: Daburi no kiki
16.plot: Denki is worried to fail the Ninjutsu test and become a repeater. Iwabe, the repeater student, overhear him. Iwabee is also worried about failing Arithmetic.

17.title: Sarada, hashiru!!
17.plot: Sarada offers to run an errand for her mother, Sakura, who is going on a trip. Sarada needs to return a stuffed toy to a girl at a hospital and takes the train to get there. When she accidentally leaves it on the train, trouble ensues.

18.title: Uzumaki-ke no ichinichi
18.plot: When Himawari comes down with a fever, Boruto is reminded of the day of Naruto's inauguration as the 7th Hokage where something strange happened to her. Later, Naruto tries to bond with Boruto by going out to eat at Ramen Ichiraku.

19.title: Uchiha Sarada
19.plot: Sarada starts to become very envious of her peers because they are able to spend time with their fathers, whereas she has no recollection of her father, Sasuke, at all. After she interrogates Sakura of her relationship with Sasuke, Sarada finds an old photo of him with a group of people, among which is a girl with glasses. After seeing this girl, Sarada begins to question her relationship with Sakura.

20.title: Sharingan no shônen
20.plot: Sasuke encounters a strange boy that possesses the Sharingan. After being alerted of this situation, Naruto intends to meet up with Sasuke to investigate. When Sarada overhears this, she plans on following Naruto to finally meet her father.

21.title: Sasuke to Sarada
21.plot: After Sarada is nearly attacked by Sasuke, she is upset with her father for not recognizing her and for no answers to her questions. After Sarada runs off, Naruto tries to comfort her, but they are attacked by Shin and a mysterious man.

22.title: Tsunagaru omoi
22.plot: After Sakura is kidnapped by Shin, Naruto is unable to locate her, which makes Sarada worried. To find Shin, the group decides to head to the person he may have a connection to: Orochimaru.

23.title: Tsunagari no katachi
23.plot: After deciding she wants to be the one to save her mother, Sarada and the others hurry to Shin's hideout to find Sakura.

24.title: Boruto to Sarada
24.plot: The Leaf Village becomes excited with the arrival of the other Kage for the Five Kage Summit. Boruto takes this opportunity to graffiti the Hokage Stone Faces. Meanwhile, Sarada begins to practice using her Sharingan.

25.title: Haran no shûgakuryokô!!
25.plot: The Academy has its very first field trip outside of the Land of Fire and Boruto and the rest of his class head to the Hidden Mist Village in the Land of Water.

26.title: Mizukage no kôkeisha
26.plot: The Leaf Academy students meet with the Mizukage and tour the Hidden Mist's ninja academy, where Boruto is offered an opportunity to spar with Kagura.

27.title: Yûjô no shinobi bauto
27.plot: After Tsurushi Hachiya and his gang kidnap Denki, Boruto and his friends, along with Kagura, go to save him and end up going to battle. During the battle, secrets about Kagura are revealed.

28.title: Sensen fukoku
28.plot: Shizuma Hoshigaki appears before Boruto and Kagura with the desire to enlist Kagura in his cause to start a revolution and wage war against the peaceful shinobi order.

29.title: Shin shinobigatana shichinin shû!!
29.plot: Boruto and Sarada accompany Chojuro to find Shizuma and his friends, including Kagura, who have declared themselves to be the new Seven Swordsmen of the Mist. Meanwhile, Mitsuki meets with Suigetsu.

30.title: Sharingan vs raito kiba
30.plot: After being separated from Boruto and Chojuro, Sarada engages in battle with the kunoichi Buntan Kurosuki, who wields the sword called the Lightning Blade, Kiba the Fang.

31.title: Boruto to Kagura
31.plot: Boruto fights Kagura and tries to convince him to stop following Shizuma and return with him. When Boruto's words fail to change Kagura's mind, Mitsuki arrives and reveals the contents of the scroll he received.

32.title: Omiyage kuesuto
32.plot: After returning from the Hidden Mist Village, Boruto had forgotten about his promise to Himawari that he would bring her a souvenir. Boruto begins a search for an authentic Mst Village item so he doesn't upset her.

33.title: Suranpu!! Chôjû giga
33.plot: Inojin suddenly starts having trouble being able to perform his Super Beast Scroll jutsu and looks to his father for help. Sai makes a suggestion for Inojin to join an art competition to find out for himself what the problem is.

34.title: Hoshi furu yoru
34.plot: With the graduation exams coming soon, Boruto wants to create a memorable experience with all of his friends before they graduate by going on a camping trip.

35.title: Sansha mendan...!!
35.plot: The Academy students have parent-teacher conferences to discuss their futures as ninja. Boruto, despite having excellent skills, has never thought about his future as a shinobi. He meets Sukea, a journalist that notices his carefreeness.

36.title: Sotsugyô shiken, kaishi...!!!
36.plot: The Academy students begin the graduation exams. After they pass the written exam with ease, the practical exam has the students taking on their sensei, as well as the sixth Hokage, Kakashi Hatake.

37.title: Shinobi no kakugo
37.plot: Boruto continues to fight Kakashi until he is immobilized by him. Kakashi proceeds to criticize Boruto's class, believing the students are not taking the idea of being ninja seriously enough, with Boruto's attitude to blame.

38.title: Sûrîmanseru, kessei...?
38.plot: Now as genin, Boruto's classmates are sorted into their three-man squads. When it is decided that Boruto, Sarada, and Mitsuki will become a team, Sarada and Boruto wish to repeal the decision, not wanting to be together on the same team.

39.title: Michita tsuki ga terasu michi
39.plot: In the past, Mitsuki had once lost his memories. He goes on a mission with his parent, Orochimaru, to retrieve his memories. During the mission, he learns a truth about himself and needs to make a difficult decision.

40.title: Dai nana han. Hatsu ninmu!!
40.plot: Boruto, Sarada, and Mitsuki begin their first mission as the new Team 7.

41.title: Kessoku no chikara
41.plot: Team 7's mission turns into a rescue mission to save the village head of Green Banks after she is kidnapped by rogue ninja.

42.title: Ninja no oshigoto
42.plot: Team 7 is assigned a mission to detain a man that has barricaded himself inside a bank.

43.title: Byakuya-dan, arawaru!!
43.plot: A group of noble thieves known as the Byakuya Gang, commit a robbery in the Hidden Leaf Village. After gaining information on where they can find one of the thieves, Team 7 tries to detain them.

44.title: Shikadai no mayoi
44.plot: The Byakuya Gang's activities begin to increase in number. Some people revere them as heroes and others, like Boruto, as villains. But Shikadai's thoughts lie somewhere in-between. Amidst the turmoil, Shikadai again meets the boy, Ryogi.

45.title: Yuki no hi no kioku
45.plot: The Byakuya Gang begin to stir up unrest by leading civilians to protest the Kaminarimon Company because of its wealth. Ryogi worries about his new friend Shikadai, but memories of his past push him forward with the Byakuya Gang's plans.

46.title: Kekkô!! Goku yoru sakusen
46.plot: The protest against the Kaminarimon Company grows more intense and ninja of all ranks are called to control the crowd. Shikadai senses that the situation is similar to a game of shogi, and suspects the protest is being used as a decoy.

47.title: Naritai sugata
47.plot: Boruto and Shikadai go after Ryogi and Gekko to stop them from stealing Katasuke's scroll.

48.title: Genin dokyumentarî!!
48.plot: After their suspension has ended, Team 5 is given a mission from the Hokage to take part in a documentary about genin for the Academy.

49.title: Wasabi de Namida
49.plot: Team 15 is given a mission to capture animals that have escaped from a zoo. Hanabi Hyuga, their leader, believes that Sumire, Wasabi, and Namida can handle the mission by themselves, but Wasabi and Namida begin to bicker with each other.

50.title: Chûnin senbatsu shiken suisen kaigi
50.plot: With the Chunin Exams coming soon, Konohamaru, Udon, Moegi, and Shino discuss their genin teams and recap their past actions, contemplating if they would be able to handle the exams.

51.title: Boruto no tanjôbi
51.plot: Team 7 is given a mission to apprehend a group of thieves that robbed from the Thunder Train. Boruto is in a foul mood throughout the mission due to Naruto missing his birthday party.

52.title: Sasuke no kage
52.plot: Upon finding a monstrous White Zetsu in the ruins, Konohamaru divulges information to Team 7 about Kaguya Otsutsuki, elaborating how dangerous their mission has potentially become.

53.title: Himawari no tanjôbi
53.plot: The Chunin Exams are coming up and the applications have been handed out to the genin teams. Everyone is excited, except for Boruto, who has no interest in taking the exams. Later, the Uzumaki's celebrate Himawari's birthday.

54.title: Sasuke to Boruto
54.plot: Boruto meets Sasuke face to face for the very first time. Determined to get back at Naruto for breaking his promise, Boruto asks Sasuke to make him his student. Sasuke is willing to take Boruto on as his student, but on one condition.

55.title: Kagaku ningu
55.plot: Boruto begins to train under Sasuke. But as Boruto gets easily frustrated, he begins making use the scientific ninja tool to help with his training. Meanwhile, the Otsutsuki Clan begin their plan to find the Jinchuriki for their chakra.

56.title: Raibaru, shûketsu!!
56.plot: Genin from different villages arrive at the Hidden Leaf Village for the Chunin Exams. Team 7 encounters several of these new arrivals. Shortly after, the first round of the Chunin Exams begins.

57.title: Make rarenai riyû
57.plot: The second round of the Chunin Exam begins. For the second round, the genin teams must capture a rival team's flag without losing their own.

58.title: Tônamento, kaishi!!
58.plot: The time has come for the third and final round of the Chunin Exams. The final round will begin the elimination of the remaining genin by having them fight one on one battles to decide who will become chunin.

59.title: Boruto VS Shikadai
59.plot: The match between Chocho and Shinki begins. Going up against a relentless opponent, Chocho gives it her all in the battle. Later, when the first elimination round concludes, the second round starts with Boruto and Shikadai's battle.

60.title: Konohagakure VS Sunagakure
60.plot: The second round of the elimination continues with Sarada and Mitsuki battling Araya and Shinki of the Sand Village.

61.title: Satetsu tsukai: Shinki
61.plot: The final battle of the Chunin Exams pits Boruto, Sarada, and Shinki in a battle royal to determine who will become the champion.

62.title: Ôtsutsuki, shûrai!!
62.plot: Just as Naruto disqualifies Boruto and takes his headband, the Otsutsuki Clan arrive to the arena and begin to attack, with Naruto as their prime target.

63.title: Sasuke no kirifuda
63.plot: Boruto awakens to find out that Naruto has been taken by the Otsutsuki. When Boruto sees the destruction and the amount of innocent people injured due to the attack, he begins to understand his father's love and devotion to the village.

64.title: Naruto, dakkan!!
64.plot: Boruto follows Sasuke and the Kage to the Otsutsuki Clan's dimension to rescue Naruto. When they arrive, they battle against Momoshiki and Kinshiki. On the battlefield, Boruto and Naruto begin to understand each other for the first time.

65.title: Chi to ko
65.plot: Momoshiki undergoes a transformation and becomes seemingly invincible. Boruto watches as Naruto and Sasuke begin to fight at full power, but the moment comes for Boruto to join in, and his actions will determine the fate of the battle.

66.title: Ore no monogatari...!!
66.plot: Boruto goes around the village apologizing to everyone for cheating during the Chunin Exams. Though things have gone back to normal after the Otsutsuki Clan's attack, Momoshiki's last words still have him concerned.

67.title: Chô Chôchô chô môdo!!
67.plot: Team 7 and Team 10 are tasked with a joint mission to be bodyguards for two actors that have received a death threat.

68.title: Chô Chôchô kisu môdo!!
68.plot: After Chocho is chosen to be a stand in for an injured actress, Tomaru, who is attracted to her skinny form, begins flirting with her. Chocho becomes love-struck and Sarada and the others begin to worry about her dramatic behavior.

69.title: Chô Chôchô koi sôdô!!
69.plot: Tomaru is kidnapped by the gas mask ninja during filming. The ninja demands a ransom to be paid in exchange for his safe return. Chocho worries about Tomaru, but Ashina decides to be the one to pay the ransom to get Tomaru back.

70.title: Kinchô no mukôgawa
70.plot: Metal is to be trained by Rock Lee to learn the taijutsu technique, The Eight Inner Gates. However, when Rock Lee sees his son wearing a necklace to ward off his anxiety, he calls off the training, leaving Metal to question why he did.

71.title: Sekai de ichiban katai ishi
71.plot: Boruto, Sarada, and Mitsuki look after The Third Tsuchikage, Ohnoki, after he refuses to attend the Kage Summit being held in the Leaf Village.

72.title: Mitsuki no ishi
72.plot: The guards at the village entrance have been attacked and Mitsuki has gone missing. Boruto and Sarada become concerned and look for him. When jonin are summoned by the Hokage to discuss the incident, they spy on the meeting to learn more.

73.title: Tsuki no uragawa
73.plot: Once it's discovered that Boruto and Sarada have left the village, Team 10 is assigned to bring them back. Meanwhile Boruto and Sarada go to find Orochimaru to ask him if he can explain the meaning of Mitsuki's message.

74.title: Teki wa Ino-Shika-Chô...!!
74.plot: As Boruto and Sarada begin to make their way to the Ryuchi Cave, Team 10 intercepts them, demanding that they return with them to the Leaf Village.

75.title: Ryûchi-dô no shiren
75.plot: Boruto and the others find Ryuchi Cave, but as they navigate the cave, they must undergo various trials before meeting the White Snake Sage.

76.title: Gekirin ni furero
76.plot: In exchange for providing the information inside Mitsuki's snake, the White Snake Sage tells Boruto to retrieve a "reverse scale" from a snake named Garaga.

77.title: Kyôteki, Garaga no môkô!!
77.plot: The battle to obtain Garaga's reverse scale continues. Garaga's ability to detect his enemy's location and turn them into stone makes the battle more difficult. Boruto and the others come up with a strategy that may help restrain Garaga.

78.title: Sorezore no omowaku
78.plot: Boruto's group learns that Mitsuki is heading for the Land of Earth. But in order to relay the information they have learned back to the Leaf Village, they decide to split up.

79.title: Saikai, Mitsuki...!!
79.plot: As Boruto's group is about to catch up to Mitsuki, they are stopped by Kokuyou. Kokuyou has immense strength and Boruto's group is overwhelmed. But with the arrival of help they are able to advance onward and finally meet with Mitsuki.

80.title: Mitsuki no tomodachi
80.plot: Mitsuki continues to follow Kokuyou and Sekiei. But as they travel, Sekiei's body begins to deteriorate. While waiting for help, Sekiei asks Mitsuki to tell him about human life. In the Hidden Stone Village, Kurotsuchi is attacked.

81.title: Boruto no negai
81.plot: As Sarada, Shikadai, Inojin, and Chocho wait for Boruto to recover, they contemplate whether or not they should return the Leaf Village. Meanwhile, Boruto dreams of a reality where Mitsuki has not left the village.

82.title: Sennyû!! Iwagakure no sato
82.plot: Boruto, Sarada, Shikadai, and Chocho sneak into the Hidden Stone Village hoping to find and get help from Ohnoki. They are unaware, however, that someone has noticed their presence and are secretly being watched.

83.title: Ônoki no seigi
83.plot: Boruto and the others are able to meet with Ohnoki, but they are shocked to learn of his involvement in the plot with the Akuta.

84.title: Ônoki no omoi, Kû no omoi
84.plot: As they make their way to the rendezvous, Boruto and Ohnoki find themselves trapped inside of a barrier in a shinobi training ground. Meanwhile, Mitsuki meets with Ku.

85.title: Kokoro no ishi
85.plot: To escape the barrier, Boruto searches for his Heart of Stone. During his search, he comes across a familiar face. Meanwhile, in order to fully heal his comrades, Ku decides that drastic measures need to be taken to fulfill their purpose.

86.title: Kozuchi no ishi
86.plot: Ohnoki takes Boruto to the place of his grandson's death and explains how the tragedy occurred and the development of his plan following it.

87.title: Ikiteiru jikkan
87.plot: Boruto and Ohnoki are found by Kakou. Boruto battles with Kakou, but struggles against his Particle Style jutsu. Meanwhile, Shikadai attempts to deliver news of the ongoing crisis to the Leaf Village.

88.title: Gekitotsu, Kokuyô!!
88.plot: Boruto's group is captured and taken back to the Hidden Stone Village, along with Ohnoki. But when they arrive to the village, Ohnoki is shocked to find the villagers have vanished. Ohnoki demands an explanation, but Ku refuses to comply.

89.title: Tsuranuku kokoro
89.plot: Boruto and Sarada fall under Kirara's genjutsu, which takes control of their bodies' movements. Treating them like dolls, Kirara orders them to kill each other. Meanwhile, Ohnoki, who has been imprisoned, reflects on the error of his ways.

90.title: Mitsuki to Sekiei
90.plot: Mitsuki suddenly attacks Ku, leaving everyone shocked and confused, especially Sekiei. Feeling immensely betrayed, Sekiei attacks Mitsuki.

91.title: Ônoki no ishi
91.plot: Ku, with his newly acquired heart, comes after Mitsuki. With Team 7 reunited, Boruto, Mitsuki and Sarada fight Ku to put a stop to him.

92.title: Atarashî nichijô
92.plot: Boruto, Sarada and the others return to the Leaf Village with Mitsuki. Sarada worries about the future if their team, but Boruto maintains faith that things will go back to normal.

93.title: Oya ko no hi
93.plot: The Leaf Village celebrates a new holiday called Parent and Child Day. Naruto spends the day with Himawari, who wants a limited edition toy made only for the holiday.

94.title: Tenkomori! Ôkui batoru
94.plot: During Parent and Child Day, Chocho and Choji enter a food eating contest in hopes of Choji impressing Karui.

95.title: Musume to ichaicha dai sakusen
95.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

96.title: Episode #1.96
96.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

-1.title: OVA: Boruto narutimetto sutômu Ver.
-1.plot: Team Konohamaru is given a mission to track down a suspicious person in the village. Meanwhile, before training with Shikadai and Inojin, Chocho tries to find potato chips when they seem to be sold out in every store.

imdb.plot outline: Naruto was a young shinobi with an incorrigible knack for mischief. He achieved his dream to become the greatest ninja in the village and his face sits atop the Hokage Monument. But this is not his story. A new generation of ninja are ready to take the stage, led by Naruto's own son, Boruto.
imdb.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
plot: Unlike Naruto, Boruto is about a son who's living his life along his friend, avoiding being in his father's shadow. He has adventures in younger version, in school, revealing new abilities.

Naruto was a young shinobi with an incorrigible knack for mischief. He achieved his dream to become the greatest ninja in the village and his face sits atop the Hokage Monument. But this is not his story. A new generation of ninja are ready to take the stage, led by Naruto's own son, Boruto.

Naruto has officially become Homage, married Hinata Hyuga and have two children, Boruto Uzumaki and Himawari Uzumaki. Boruto, unlike his father doesn't want to be Hokage. Boruto only wants to be recognized by Naruto. Boruto will have to work hard with his teammates Sarada Uchiha, daughter of Sakura and Sasuke Uchiha, and Mitsuki they will be a new, improved, better generation of Shinobi.::Amir Lyons
